summary: Adds two new daggers called Soulreaver and The Avatar.
descriptionHtml:
Adds two new daggers called Soulreaver and The Avatar. Both are ebony daggers with unique enchantments. Soulreaver absorbs 10 points of health, magicka, and stamina, and has a 3 second soul trap enchantment. The Avatar does 50 points of damage of fire, frost, and shock. There is no slowing effect from the frost. Both daggers can be disenchanted.

This is my first mod, so I hope you enjoy!
author: TheRussianFapper
